fixer = function(exp){
  exp = gsub("--","+",exp,fixed=T)
  exp = gsub("(x-0)","x",exp,fixed=T)
  exp = gsub("(y-0)","y",exp,fixed=T)
  return(exp)
}
gcd2 <- function(a, b) {
  if (b == 0) a else Recall(b, a %% b)
}
gcd <- function(...) Reduce(gcd2, c(...))
